name: Beat Breaker (Black Boss)
description:
This is my first game as a Game Design student.

The game is currently in Development but the base gameplay is ready.

In this game, players have to tap with the song's rhythm to score. The game's main goal is to complete songs without missing any notes. 

The game might not work properly with large/long-screen devices.

Future Plans

> Skill mechanics

>Accuracy measurement

>Note spawn sync with the music

>Options and settings menu

>UI scaling fix with big-screen devices

>Better UI and Post Processing

>Add a video on the entire development process 

>Final Release on Google Play

>-----------------------<
